column2: "Afei emi mara Paul menam Kraest no dwe nye ne tsema do meserɛ hom
column3: emi a mowɔ hom nkyɛn a mebrɛ moho adze wɔ hom enyim
mma hom nnyɛ ma meba hom nkyɛn a
column4: mannyɛ ndam wɔ hom do; ndam a mususu dɛ ɔsɛ dɛ meyɛ wɔ hɔn a wobu hɛn dɛ yɛnam honam afamu no do no."

column2: "osiandɛ akodze a yɛdze ko no nnyɛ honam dze
column3: na mbom ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn tum akodze a wɔdze dwuruw akoban; yedwuruw adwen;"

column2: "nye adze a ɔkrɔn biara a wɔma do tsia Nyankopɔn nyimdzee
column3: na yɛfa adwen nyina ndɔmmum yɛ setsie ma Kraest;"
sɛ hom setsie wie pɛyɛ a

column2: "Hom nhwɛ dza ɔda hom enyi do. Sɛ obi dze no werɛ twer nankasa noho dɛ ɔyɛ Kraest dze a
column3: wɔmma onsusu iyi so wɔ nankasa no mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔno yɛ Kraest dze no
column5: mbrɛ hɛn so yɛyɛ Kraest dze ara nye no."

column2: "Na sɛ mehyehyɛ moho mbordo wɔ tum a Ewuradze dze maa hɛn wɔ hom ntowdo na nnyɛ hom nsɛe ntsi no ho mpo a
"Memmpɛ dɛ ɔyɛ dɛ gyama medze nwoma rupuw hom bi."

column3: No nwoma dze no mu yɛ dur
column5: naaso sɛ ɔwɔ hɛn ntamu dze a
column7: na ne kasaa so ahoɔdzen biara nnyi mu."

column3: mbrɛ yennyi hɔ a yɛtse wɔ nwoma mu wɔ nsɛm mu no
column4: yɛwɔ hɔ so a mbrɛ yɛtse wɔ nyɛe mu ara nye no."

column2: "Na yennsi hɛn bo mmfa hɛn ho mmfora
column3: anaa yɛmmfa hɛnho nnto hɔn a wɔkamfo hɔnankasa hɔnho no ho; na hɔn dze
column5: na wɔdze hɔnho toto hɔnankasa hɔnho ntsi

column4: na mbom dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn no susudua esusu ama hɛn kɛpem no
column5: dɛm esusudze yi odu hom nkyɛn."

column2: "Na yɛnntwe hɛn mu nntra do dɛ gyama yenndu hom nkyɛn
column3: osiandɛ yɛdze Kraest asɛmpa no ebodu hom nkyɛn mpo."

column2: "Na yɛnnhyehyɛ hɛnho nntra do wɔ binom edwuma mu
column5: wɔbɛyɛ hɛn kɛse mbordo wɔ hom mu dɛ mbrɛ hɛn susudua kɛpem
column7: "na yɛakɛka asɛmpa no wɔ mbeambea a ɔwɔ hom ekyir noho
column8: na yɛannhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ mbrɛ obi no dwumadzi pem wɔ dza woewie yɛ dada no ho."

column3: ma ɔnhyehyɛ noho wɔ Ewuradze mu:"

column2: "na nnyɛ nyia ɔkamfo noho na wɔapen no no
column3: mbom nyia Ewuradze kamfo no no a."
